definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: appar. represented as ancestor of the Hittites (etym. and mng. unknown; pronounced as fr. √ [[ע]]“[[ע]] in Heb. & As., but not Egypt.; v. [[חִתִּי]] infr.)—‘begotten’ by Canaan Ge 10:15 (J) = 1Ch 1:13; elsewh. only in combin. with [[בְּנֵי]], [[בְּנוֹת]];

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[בְּנֵי־חֵת]] acc. to P lived at Mamre (Hebron), and one of them sold Abraham the cave of Machpelah for a sepulchre Ge 23:3, Ge 23:5, Ge 23:10, Ge 23:10, Ge 23:16, Ge 23:18, Ge 23:20, Ge 25:10, Ge 49:32.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[חֵת]]([[־]])[[בְּנוֹת]] only of wives of Esau Ge 27:46, Ge 27:46 (P; LXX om. v:b; ‖[[בְּנוֹת הָאָרֶץ]] = [[בְּנוֹת כְּנׇ֑עַן]] Ge 28:1).
